topics.title: Systematic Theology?
topics.definition: The attempt to arrange religious truths in a self-consistent whole.
topics.verse: See to it that no one takes you captive by philosophy...

topics.title: Faith (Pistis)
topics.definition: Intellectual assent to a set of propositions; a state of mind.
topics.verse: Now faith is the substance of things hoped for...

points.text: Belief in a set of propositions

topics.title: Faith (Emunah)
topics.definition: Firmness, steadfastness, fidelity. An action of support.
topics.verse: And his hands were steady (emunah) until the going down of the sun.
